data.text:
For the fictional version, see Frank Miller (Watchmen TV Series)

Frank Miller (b. January 27, 1957) is an American comic book writer and artist best known for his film-noir style comic stories, most notably The Dark Knight Returns, Daredevil, and Sin City. He is often regarded as one of the greatest comic writers of all time.

Professional History

Frank Miller scripted and illustrated the highly-acclaimed alternate-future-Batman story, Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, and its sequel, The Dark Knight Strikes Again. Miller also scripted the modern-source origin story for The Batman, Batman: Year One.
